title: Kent State’s Dining Services Unveils Updates to Better Serve Campus Community (Kent State University)
text: ( Source : Kent State University ) Kent State University's Dining Services has made various updates to its markets and cafés on campus in response to students' needs. These updates range from clearer labeling of menus to helping students with
